findings.title: Potential Reentrancy
findings.description: External call executes before storage write. If the callee re-enters, contract state may be manipulated before completion. Risk amplifiers detected: external calls use dynamic or over-privileged call flags; execution reaches deep internal call-chain depth before state effects.
findings.recommendation: Apply checks-effects-interactions ordering and explicit reentrancy lock for methods performing external calls.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=2, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.344, penalty=0.086, confidence 0.900->0.814.

findings.title: Insecure Upgradeability Path
findings.description: Contract exposes upgrade/destroy behavior without strong authorization checks.
findings.recommendation: Protect update/destroy methods using strict witness checks and preferably multisig governance.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Insecure Upgradeability Path
findings.description: Contract exposes upgrade/destroy behavior without strong authorization checks.
findings.recommendation: Protect update/destroy methods using strict witness checks and preferably multisig governance.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Missing Access Control
findings.description: Sensitive operations execute without Runtime.CheckWitness or equivalent guard.
findings.recommendation: Enforce authorization for state-changing and privileged methods.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Over-Privileged External Call Flags
findings.description: External call uses CallFlags.All (0x0F), enabling full callee capabilities.
findings.recommendation: Reduce call flags to the minimum required permissions (least privilege).
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Unchecked External Call Return Value
findings.description: Result of external call 'CALLT:deserialize' is not validated before continuing.
findings.recommendation: Check return values and revert/abort on failure.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.700; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Potential Unbounded Loop
findings.description: Execution path depth=61 with loop back-edges detected.
findings.recommendation: Add bounded iteration checks and short-circuit exit conditions.

findings.title: On-chain Randomness Reliance
findings.description: Contract uses runtime randomness primitive directly.
findings.recommendation: Harden with anti-manipulation logic and delayed settlement where possible.

findings.title: High GAS Consumption Path
findings.description: Execution path consumes approximately 65719 gas units.
findings.recommendation: Reduce expensive syscalls/loops and split heavy workflows.
